TopicTitle: Big Storm About To Blow Through Northeastren US

Articles.Content:
What the title says. Flash flood watch and tornado watch will be in effect. Straight-line winds (basically a tornado that goes straight instead of forming a funnel cloud) are expected. The area in most risk of severe damage, if I remember correctly, is Illinois. It will hit tonight and last all day tomorrow.

Just thought it would be a good idea to let everyone know. Stay safe.

(ps.of COURSE I live in the northeastern US... this is gonna suck... )
Will it hit the New York City/NJ area?

Will it hit the New York City/NJ area?

Not sure, nice to be prepared just in case.
depends if the storm is going west to east you get ready ,or east to west don't worry.

Aww that's cute, we get stuff like that several times a month.
